revenue_growth_ytd.explanation: Revenue grew ~15.8% YTD (nine months) compared to prior year, driven by robust cloud and Productivity segments.
revenue_growth_ytd.source_type: 10-Q filing Q3 FY2024 (nine months ended March 31, 2024)
revenue_growth_ytd.derivation: Nine-month revenue $180,395M vs $155,726M prior-year nine months from Income Statements.

operating_margin.explanation: Operating margin around 45.2%, up from ~41.2% last year, showcasing strong scaling and operating leverage.
operating_margin.derivation: Operating Income $81,508M / Total Revenue $180,395M = 45.2%. Prior-year margin ~64,269 / 155,726 ≈ 41.3%.

net_cash_position.explanation: Solid net cash: huge liquidity minus debt implies a strong balance sheet buffer.
net_cash_position.derivation: (Cash & equivalents + short-term investments) $80,021M − (short-term debt $20,535M + long-term debt $42,658M) ≈ $16,828M.

free_cash_flow.explanation: Very strong free cash flow; operating cash vastly exceeds capex.

capex_intensity.explanation: Capex about 17.0% of revenue – meaningful but consistent with growth and cloud infrastructure needs.
